description.en: Battle of Guardians (BOG) is a real-time multiplayer NFT fighting game developed in UNREAL ENGINE and built on the SOLANA NETWORK. Players engage in fierce multi-realm battles in an expansive game world. BOG is one on one game where players are in a constant battle to defeat other players to earn more rewards.
